snippet: The Justice Department reaches a settlement with SunTrust over mortgage practices. | An S.E.C. filing from William A. Ackman concerning his Allergan bid contains an error. | A mortgage deal is under scrutiny. | Argentina is moving to circumvent a...
abstract: The Justice Department reaches a settlement with SunTrust over mortgage practices. | An S.E.C. filing from William A. Ackman concerning his Allergan bid contains an error. | A mortgage deal is under scrutiny. | Argentina is moving to circumvent a Supreme Court order on the country’s debt.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: SunTrust in Mortgage Settlement
